divs: Sighting Details1. I was Driving home from DMV 2. I noticed this object because I'm always looking up in the skies ( quickly when I drive) 3. At first glance I thought it was a silver ballon. 4. It moved west to east at a slow pace about 100ft from ground. Then it drifted upward and parked under a large cloud and and stayed there. I had to leave becuse the sun started hurting my eyes.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around June 25th 2010
